item.title: Got the NTDS.dit. Now what?
item.description: This post will go into some opsec considerations as it relates to high value files. Opsec related tactics, techniques and procedures vary greatly between hackers, but for what it’s worth I like to consider the below when I think about high value files and lateral movement. I like to leave an environment at least as secure as it was when I went in.
